sponsors.name: Nimble Approach
sponsors.about: Nimble are a tightly knit collective of elite product & technology professionals who love what we do! We’ve taken a people first, quality-driven approach to growing our community by handpicking only people who have the right values, characteristics, and ability.

sponsors.name: Corecom Consulting
sponsors.about: Corecom Consulting is an award-winning IT recruitment company. We serve a wide range of employers: from large scale international businesses to small and medium enterprises. We provide contract and permanent roles in a variety of IT specialisms.

sponsors.name: Ministry of Testing
sponsors.about: The Ministry of Testing aims to change and lead within the software testing world.  We are doing this through a strong focus on learning, collaboration and resources.

sponsors.name: Ady Stokes
sponsors.about: I’m passionate about exploring and testing software as part of the creation and development of useful applications. I strongly believe in collaborative methods and using different thinking techniques to look at things from all angles.

sponsors.name: Infinity Works
sponsors.about: A collective of leading Engineers and Technologists who have the intelligence to devise the right solution, the skills to build it to drive real change in your organisation.

sponsors.name: The Coders Guild
sponsors.about: Promoting inclusion, diversity and equality through expert training, coaching and CPD opportunities for software development. A safe space offering community-driven, peer-reviewed and open-source knowledge share.

sponsors.name: IBM
sponsors.about: Together with our clients, we're using technologies like AI, cloud, blockchain & IoT to transform business, industries and the world. Let’s put smart to work.

sponsors.name: CAP HPI
sponsors.about: Best of breed intelligence & independent decision support on buying, selling or running cars, vans, trucks & bikes.

sponsors.name: Conflux
sponsors.about: Expert-led group learning for adopting fast flow and Team Topologies.

sponsors.name: Iliad Solutions
sponsors.about: As technology evolves, payment systems are becoming increasingly complex. Iliad Solutions lessens the risk when deploying new technology which protects your brand.

sponsors.name: emis health
sponsors.about: We provide every health sector with innovative technologies, from market-leading clinical management systems to health analytics tools.

sponsors.name: Tony Holroyd
sponsors.about: Tony Holyroyd is an Atelier legend, providing sponsorship out of his own pocket, all to see the Leeds testing community thrive. Has no online presence, likes it that way.

sponsors.name: Hanzo Archives
sponsors.about: Solving the biggest challenges in enterprise ediscovery and compliance today - complete control of data created by collaboration apps and dynamic websites.

sponsors.name: Glean
sponsors.about: Glean is the antidote to information overload for improved student success.
